## HTTP\_GATEWAY\_TIMEOUT\_INTERCEPTOR\_PROVIDER variable

Provider for proper use of HttpGatewayTimeoutInterceptor, use this provider to inject this interceptor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
HTTP_GATEWAY_TIMEOUT_INTERCEPTOR_PROVIDER: ClassProvider
```
